mod.name: The Human
mod.description: Adds Harold the Human as a playable character.

cards.name: Consequences
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When this is drawn, shuffle a Doubt, Regret and Shame into your draw pile.

cards.name: Poverty
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When you draw this, lose 3 Health.

cards.name: Tired
cards.description: When drawn, Exhaust a random card in your hand.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Pacifist: Gain 5 thehuman:Peaceful instead.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Pacifist: Gain 8 thehuman:Peaceful instead.

cards.name: Slap
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Slap+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 1 thehuman:Injured.

cards.name: Backhand Slap
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage and apply 2 thehuman:Injured to an enemy.
If this card is discarded, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Backhand Slap+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage and apply 2 thehuman:Injured to an enemy.
If this card is discarded, deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.description: thehuman:Uncover 2 cards.

cards.name: Confused
cards.description:
Discard 2 cards.
Set the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this turn.

cards.name: Confused+
cards.description:
Discard 2 cards.
Set the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this turn.

cards.name: Disposal
cards.description: Discard any amount of cards. For each card discarded this way, find 1 thehuman:Junk.

cards.name: Disposal+
cards.description: Discard any amount of cards. For each card discarded this way, find 1 thehuman:Junk.

cards.name: Dumpster Diving
cards.description:
Find 2 thehuman:Junk.
thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Dumpster Diving+
cards.description:
Find 3 thehuman:Junk.
thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Focused
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, draw a card and gain 3 Block.
Gain 5 thehuman:Peaceful.

cards.name: Focused+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, draw a card and gain 3 Block.
Gain 5 thehuman:Peaceful.

cards.name: Freshly Brewed Coffee
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Restore 1 Health.
Lifestyle: Draw a card next turn.

cards.name: Freshly Brewed Coffee+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Regen and Dexterity.
Restore 1 Health.
Lifestyle: Draw a card next turn.

cards.name: Front Kick
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage and apply 1 Weak to an enemy.
Gain 2 Block.
Draw a card.
Technique: Gain 1 energy.

cards.name: Front Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage and apply 1 Weak to an enemy.
Gain 3 Block.
Draw a card.
Technique: Gain 1 energy.

cards.name: Furious Slap
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Deal 3 damage and apply 1 thehuman:Injured to an enemy.

cards.name: Furious Slap+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Deal 6 damage and apply 1 thehuman:Injured to an enemy.

cards.name: Heel Kick
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage twice.
Technique: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy twice.

cards.name: Heel Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage twice.
Technique: Deal 9 damage to a random enemy twice.

cards.name: Ignore
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Pacifist: Gain 12 thehuman:Peaceful.
Lifestyle: Gain 1 thehuman:Peaceful.

cards.name: Ignore+
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.
Pacifist: Gain 12 thehuman:Peaceful.
Lifestyle: Gain 1 thehuman:Peaceful.

cards.name: Impulse Purchase
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Find 2 thehuman:Junk.

cards.name: Impulse Purchase+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Find 3 thehuman:Junk.

cards.description:

Lifestyle: Find 1 thehuman:Junk.

cards.name: In The Park+
cards.description:
Gain 3 thehuman:Healthiness and Regen.
Draw a card.
Lifestyle: Find 1 thehuman:Junk.

cards.name: Jab
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage.
Draw a card.
Technique: Deal 2 additional damage.

cards.name: Jab+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Draw a card.
Technique: Deal 4 additional damage.

cards.name: Keeping Fit
cards.description:
Gain 2 thehuman:Healthiness and 4 thehuman:Peaceful.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Keeping Fit+
cards.description:
Gain 3 thehuman:Healthiness and 4 thehuman:Peaceful.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Kung Fu!
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 1 thehuman:Healthiness.
Technique: Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Kung Fu!+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 1 thehuman:Healthiness.
Technique: Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Midlife Crisis
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak, Frail and Vulnerable to an enemy.
Pacifist: Apply 99 Weak, Frail and Vulnerable instead.

cards.name: Midlife Crisis+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak, Frail and Vulnerable to an enemy.
Pacifist: Apply 99 Weak, Frail and Vulnerable instead.

cards.name: Petty Theft
cards.description:
Find 1 thehuman:Junk.
Gain 10 Gold.

cards.name: Petty Theft+
cards.description:
Find 1 thehuman:Junk.
Gain 16 Gold.

cards.name: Preparation
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Next turn, gain 3 Block and draw 2 cards.
Lifestyle: Gain 1 Regen.

cards.name: Preparation+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Next turn, gain 6 Block and draw 2 cards.
Lifestyle: Gain 1 Regen.

cards.name: Prepare Hand
cards.description: Draw 3 cards with "Slap" in their name.

cards.name: Prepare Hand+
cards.description: Draw 4 cards with "Slap" in their name.

cards.name: Quick Draw
cards.description: Draw a thehuman:Weapon.

cards.name: Quick Draw+
cards.description:
Draw a thehuman:Weapon.
thehuman:Shoot ( 1 x 6, 4 % ) a random enemy.

cards.name: Refresh
cards.description:
Draw a card.
If this card is discarded, draw 3 cards and restore 3 Health.

cards.name: Refresh+
cards.description:
Draw a card.
If this card is discarded, draw 4 cards and restore 4 Health.

cards.name: Salvage
cards.description:
Shuffle your hand back into your draw pile.
For each card shuffled this way, return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Salvage+
cards.description:
Shuffle your hand back into your draw pile.
For each card shuffled this way, return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Scuffle
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy 3 times.
Deal damage an additional time for each thehuman:Healthiness you have over 8.
Discard a random card.

cards.name: Scuffle+
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage to a random enemy 3 times.
Deal damage an additional time for each thehuman:Healthiness you have over 8.
Discard a random card.

cards.name: Teatime
cards.description:
Gain 1 thehuman:Healthiness.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Teatime+
cards.description:
Gain 2 thehuman:Healthiness.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Ageing
cards.description:
Apply 1 Ageing to all enemies.

cards.name: Ageing+
cards.description:
Apply 1 Ageing to all enemies.
Pacifist: Gain 10 Block.

cards.name: Aggressiveness
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength and discard 1 card.

cards.name: Aggressiveness+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength and discard 1 card.

cards.name: Angst
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards from your hand.
For each card discarded, gain 1 Temporary Strength.

cards.name: Angst+
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards from your hand.
For each card discarded, gain 1 Temporary Strength.

cards.name: Arcade
cards.description: For each energy you have, deal 3 damage to a random enemy and thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Arcade+
cards.description: For each energy you have, deal 4 damage to a random enemy and thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Arsenal
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, add a random thehuman:Weapon to your hand.
It Purges when used and at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Arsenal+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, add a random thehuman:Weapon to your hand.

cards.name: Back Pain

cards.name: Back Pain+
cards.description: Apply 1 Ageing and 2 thehuman:Injured to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Renewable Contract

cards.name: Exercise
cards.description:
Exhaust any number of cards. For each card Exhausted this way, gain 1 energy.
Pacifist: Restore 10 Health.

cards.name: Exercise+
cards.description:
Exhaust any number of cards. For each card Exhausted this way, gain 1 energy.
Pacifist: Restore 10 Health.

cards.name: Freedom Of Mind
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Fetch 1.

cards.name: Freedom Of Mind+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Fetch 1.

cards.name: Fuming
cards.description: Whenever you play a card with "Slap" in its name, play it again with random targets.

cards.name: Fuming+
cards.description:
Draw a card with "Slap" in its name.
Whenever you play a card with "Slap" in its name, play it again with random targets and draw a card.

cards.name: Garbage Collector
cards.description: Whenever you play a thehuman:Junk card, thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Garbage Collector+
cards.description: Whenever you play a thehuman:Junk card, thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Happiness
cards.description: Gain 5 thehuman:Healthiness and Regen.

cards.name: Happiness+
cards.description: Gain 7 thehuman:Healthiness and Regen.

cards.name: Living It Up
cards.description:
thehuman:Uncover 3 cards.
Lifestyle: Uncover a card.

cards.name: Living It Up+
cards.description:
thehuman:Uncover 4 cards.
Lifestyle: Uncover a card.

cards.name: Man Of Tomorrow
cards.description:
Fetch 1 card from your draw pile.
Reduce the cost of ALL cards to 0 this turn.

cards.name: Man Of Tomorrow+
cards.description:
Fetch 2 cards from your draw pile.
Reduce the cost of ALL cards to 0 this turn.

cards.name: On The Streets
cards.description:
When drawn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
Add a thehuman:Weapon and 1 thehuman:Junk to your hand.
thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: On The Streets+
cards.description:
When drawn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
Add a thehuman:Weapon and 2 thehuman:Junk to your hand.
thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Prank
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage and Stun an enemy.
Shuffle a Consequences into your draw pile.

cards.name: Prank+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage and Stun an enemy.
Shuffle a Consequences into your draw pile.

cards.name: Reading
cards.description:
Gain 2 thehuman:Healthiness.
Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, add a Deep Thought to your hand.

cards.name: Reading+
cards.description:
Gain 3 thehuman:Healthiness.
Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, add a Big Brain to your hand.

cards.name: Renovation
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Draw 10 cards.
Discard your hand.
Draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Renovation+
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Draw 10 cards.
Discard your hand.
Draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Risktaker
cards.description: At the start of your turn, thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Risktaker+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Sanitation
cards.description: Replay all cards that you have Exhausted this combat.

cards.name: Sanitation+
cards.description: Replay all cards that you have Exhausted this combat.

cards.name: Silver Generation
cards.description: At the start of every third turn you take, apply 1 Ageing to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Silver Generation+
cards.description: At the start of every third turn you take, apply 1 Ageing to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Slaptacular
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Apply 2 thehuman:Injured to ALL enemies.
Replay all Slaps played this combat.

cards.name: Slaptacular+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Apply 2 thehuman:Injured to ALL enemies.
Replay all Slaps played this combat.

cards.name: Stoicism
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Whenever you discard a card, gain 1 thehuman:Peaceful.

cards.name: Stoicism+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Whenever you discard a card, gain 1 thehuman:Peaceful and thehuman:Healthiness.

cards.name: Sucker Punch
cards.description:
When drawn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
Add 2 Slaps to your hand that cost 0, but Purge when used and at the end of your turn.
Technique: Deal 10 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Sucker Punch+
cards.description:
When drawn, deal 10 damage to a random enemy.
Add 2 Slaps to your hand that cost 0, but Purge when used and at the end of your turn.
Technique: Deal 15 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Superslap
cards.description: Play 5 Slaps with random targets.

cards.name: Superslap+
cards.description: Play 5 Slaps with random targets.

cards.name: The Trash Monster
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, find 1 thehuman:Junk.
Whenever you play 3 thehuman:Junk, deal 5 damage to a random enemy, then gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.

cards.name: The Trash Monster+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, find 1 thehuman:Junk.
Whenever you play 2 thehuman:Junk, deal 5 damage to a random enemy, then gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.

relics.name: Thumbs Up
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, gain 5 Healthiness and 5 Block.

There are 4 levels of healthiness: Healthy ( 0 - 10 ), Very Healthy ( 11 - 18 ) and Extremely Healthy ( > 18 ).

Card Rewards have 4 choices instead of 3.

relics.name: Emerald Eyepiece
relics.description:
Whenever you spend Gold, if you have more than 200 Gold, gain 20 Gold.
Otherwise, gain 30 Gold.

relics.name: Environmentalist
relics.description: At the start of your turn, add a random Junk to your hand.

relics.name: Secret Training
relics.description:
Usable once per combat.

Draw 3 cards and add a Stabby Stabby to your hand.
relics.flavorText: The best way to avoid detection is to...be a ninja?

relics.name: Fire Arms
relics.description: Whenever you Shoot a Weapon, also apply 1 Burning to the target.
relics.flavorText: A revolutionary step backward in peacemaking efforts.

keywords.name: Thehuman:healthiness
keywords.description: Keep your healthiness high! The higher your healthiness, the more likely that positive effects will be applied, and vice versa.

keywords.name: Thehuman:injured
keywords.description: At the start of each turn, lose 1 to 4 health randomly for each stack of this applied.

keywords.name: Thehuman:inventory
keywords.description:
Return this card to your hand whenever it is played.

This card retains if it was not used this turn.

The cost of this card cannot be reduced below 1.

keywords.name: Thehuman:junk
keywords.description: Junk consists of cheap and useful cards.

keywords.name: Thehuman:peaceful
keywords.description: When attacked, negate damage equal to the amount of Peaceful you have.

keywords.name: Thehuman:shoot
keywords.description:
Shooting is a form of damage applied by certain ranged weapons. The damage per shot (A) is multiplied by the number of shots (B) with a Critical chance (C) and is displayed in (A x B, C) form.

After each shot, shuffle an Empty Cartridge into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Thehuman:unblockable
keywords.description: Damage of this type cannot be Blocked.

keywords.name: Thehuman:uncover
keywords.description: Obtain ANY Red, Green, Blue, Purple or Colorless card. It costs 0 but Purges when used and at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Thehuman:weapon
keywords.description: Weapons are valuable cards with attack-oriented effects.
